metadata.author: Yobie Benjamin
metadata.description: Sample text data for fraud detection testing

samples.text: Your order #12345 has been shipped and will arrive by Friday. Track your package at our website.
samples.label: legitimate

samples.text: URGENT! Your account has been compromised. Click this link immediately to secure your funds: bit.ly/scam123
samples.label: fraud

samples.text: Thank you for your recent purchase. Your payment of $49.99 has been processed successfully.
samples.label: legitimate

samples.text: Congratulations! You've won $1,000,000! Reply with your SSN and bank details to claim your prize!
samples.label: fraud

samples.text: Reminder: Your subscription renewal is coming up next month. No action needed if you wish to continue.
samples.label: legitimate

samples.text: IRS Tax Refund Notice: You have unclaimed refund of $3,458. Verify your identity at irs-refund-gov.fake
samples.label: fraud

samples.text: Limited time offer! Get 90% off all products. This exclusive deal expires in 2 hours!
samples.label: suspicious

samples.text: Your Netflix account will be suspended due to payment failure. Update your payment method here: netflix-security.phish
samples.label: fraud

samples.text: Your monthly statement is now available. Log in to your account to view and download.
samples.label: legitimate

samples.text: Act now! Your computer is infected with viruses. Call this number immediately: 1-800-SCAMMER for free tech support.
samples.label: fraud
